snippet: Rick Pitino, who has led six teams to the Final Four, including last season at Louisville, at first had reservations about his son Richard taking the head coaching job at Florida International.
abstract: Richard Pitino, at 30 years old, will become one of youngest coaches in Division 1 college basketball when he starts his job at Florida International this season; his father, Louisville coach Rick Pitino, had initially expressed doubts about his son's choice of profession, but now supports him fully.
lead_paragraph: Rick Pitino, who has led six teams to the Final Four, including last season at Louisville, at first had reservations about his son Richard taking the head coaching job at Florida International.

headline.seo: Rick Pitino Says Florida International Is Good Fit for Son Richard’s Coaching Debut
headline.main: Pitino and Son Are on Same Path and Same Page
headline.print_headline: Pitino and Son Are on Same Path and Same Page
